commitResults.messageBody: Rename the project from Duke to Gus and complete skeletal.

Modify the display format and the improve Gus
such that it echoes inputs from user

Gus will exit when user input 'bye'

Gus will now store user input into an array of
lenght 100, and the content of the array can be
shown by inputting 'list'

Modify  display format: including a user prefix
for user input.

Gus can now mark task as done or not done yet
through user input that starts with 'mark' or
'unmark'

Implement three different tasks and modify main
to parse the input accordingly to create different
tasks

Implement Automated Text UI Testing that tests
Gus on commands like, todo, event, deadline, list,
mark, unmark, and bye.

Create GusException to handle errors from Gus
when parsing user input. Handle
NumberFormatException which might occur when input
is just 'mark ' or 'unmark ' due to the error
while trying to parseInt

Implement delete command for gus and modify tasks
to be stored in a ArrayList instead of an array.
Respective functions to access tasks have also
been updated accordingly

Create Command.java and CommandHandler.java that
replace the if-else input parsing process in main.

Commands are now enum types in Command.java
and the command execution logic are now in
CommandHandler.java
Implement getters that for all the task classes.

Implement Storage.java that will handle Loading
Saving tasks to/from a local file.

The main will now handle the loading and saving
of the local file.

Fixed some bugs in Storage.java including
splitting by " to " to " to: " and saving string
format
